sobre1: Hello! My name is Tiago Marques Gabriel and I am a technology student, focusing on software development and structured problem-solving. During my studies, I worked with programming in C and Java, as well as languages ​​such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
sobre2: I enjoy developing clear, efficient, and well-documented solutions, always striving to apply good coding practices. I learn new tools easily, analyze problems, and implement solutions in a logical and organized manner.
sobre3: My goal is to continue evolving in the field of technology, building projects that meet user needs and follow solid development principles.
sobre4: You can see some of my projects on GitHub and contact me to discuss collaborations.
sobre5: This portfolio is a way to showcase what I've been building and learning. If you like something here, let's chat!
desc_projeto1: Web music player with playlists, search and playback controls.
desc_projeto2: Interactive web page with JavaScript logic and animations; demo hosted on GitHub Pages.
desc_projeto3: Interactive web application in HTML/CSS/JS focused on responsive UI.
desc_projeto4: Interactive game/experience built with HTML/CSS/JS, featuring social-game-inspired mechanics.
